page.title: 12KITTOCKS DEN
page.content: As Kittock means a romping girl, the area is therefore the den of romping girls - inappropriate perhaps as here we get a true sense of peace and tranquility away from all habitation. The peace of the area is only broken by the calls of the curlew and skylark and the only real disturbance can be from the jets of R.A.F. Leuchars. A small stream flows from the den and this increases the vegetation from low growing grasses and moss to small trees. There are raised beaches all along this coast and in some places, three tiers can be seen stretching back onto the farmland.
